fields.depends_on: eval:doc.warranty == "Reprovado" ;
fields.label: Rejection Reason
fields.options:
1. Product Seal Breach
2. Incorrect Installation or Commissioning
3. Failure Related to Non-Observance of User Manual
4. Unauthorized Modifications, Changes or Repair Attempts
5. Inappropriate or Incorrect Operation
6. Insufficient Ventilation for the Device
7. Force Majeure (Lightning, Overvoltage, Fans, Fires and Others)
8. Warranty Period Expired
